00020 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_CSTR_HASH_TRAITS_H
00021 #define HYPERTABLE_CSTR_HASH_TRAITS_H

00023 #include "CharArena.h"
00024 #include "TclHash.h"

00026 namespace Hypertable {
00027 
00031 template <class HashT = TclHash2>
00032 struct CstrHashTraits {
00033   typedef CharArena key_allocator;
00034 
00035   struct hasher {
00036     HashT hasher;
00037 
00038     size_t operator()(const char *s) const { return hasher(s); }
00039   };
00040 
00041   struct key_equal {
00042     bool
00043     operator()(const char *a, const char *b) const {
00044       return std::strcmp(a, b) == 0;
00045     }
00046   };
00047 };
00048 
00049 inline size_t
00050 hash_case_cstr(const char *s) {
00051   register size_t ret = 0;
00052 
00053   for (; *s; ++s)
00054     ret += (ret << 3) + tolower((unsigned)*s);
00055 
00056   return ret;
00057 }
00058 
00059 struct CstrCaseHashTraits {
00060   typedef CharArena key_allocator;
00061 
00062   struct hasher {
00063     size_t
00064     operator()(const char *s) const { return hash_case_cstr(s); }
00065   };
00066 
00067   struct key_equal {
00068     bool
00069     operator()(const char *a, const char *b) const {
00070       for (; tolower((unsigned)*a) == tolower((unsigned)*b); ++a, ++b)
00071         if (!*a)
00072           return true;
00073 
00074       return false;
00075     }
00076   };
00077 };
00078 
00079 } // namespace Hypertable
